strapiEvent.name: Drive Electric NWA
strapiEvent.location: Pinnacle Hills Promenade in Rogers, AR
strapiEvent.description: Drive Electric NWA highlights electric cars and e-bikes and the increasingly important role they play in Northwest Arkansas transportation. It's from 11 am to 4 pm on Saturday, Sept. 30 and is free to attend. You'll find at least 15 different electric cars to explore, and e-bikes galore. A food truck, an ice cream vendor, children's activities and a DJ to set the perfect vibe for a Saturday afternoon are all part of the event. Sponsors include the Arkansas Clean Cities, Arkansas Automobile Dealers Association, Seal Solar, Lewis Automotive Group, Nunnally Chevrolet, Francis Energy, Evolve Auto, Canoo, Tesla, Envirotech, Phat Tire Bike Shop, PeopleForBikes, Pedego Fayetteville, Ozarks Electric, Carroll Electric Cooperative, SWEPCO, the NWA Regional Planning Commission, the Tesla Owners Club of Arkansas, Flux Car Charging Solutions, ACDI Energy Services and the Northwest Arkansas Council.
